String.string: Enter the past. Please check the requirements to ensure you have the appropriate party and ilevel. Echoes do not require Adventure Coins.
Go to Castle Aranea in the past to restore the Echo Arcana.
Restore a portion of the Echo Arcana.
Bloody echoes in the Castle Aranea Dungeon
Echo of schematics in Castle Aranea Grounds
The needy always have a hard life, no matter where they go.
However, always follow the path of risk
